div.head: The Printer to the Reader.
div.p:
THe hidden Treasure never availed any, as Solomon the wise said. This present Booke, like to a great Treasure was alwayes much Esteemed by the best Politicians, but it lay hidden because it went notabroad, but in a Manuscript, and came onely
to the hands of the Governours of the Venetian State, and of some few forraigne Princes, who by especiall favour were made partakers of it. Now a liberall hand which desireth the common good, by meanes of my Presse, hath communicated it to the world, that every good States man may participate of it. Receive it with a cheerefull countenance, and beleeve it will not a little profit thee and others. Farewell.
